trait.name: Languages
trait.text: Changelings begin play speaking Common and the primary language of their host society. Changelings with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following: Aklo, Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Giant, Gnoll, Goblin, and Orc.

trait.name: Natural Armor
trait.text: Changelings have a +1 natural armor bonus.

trait.name: Claws
trait.text: Changelings’ fingernails are hard and sharp, granting them two claw attacks (1d4 points of damage each).

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Changelings see perfectly in the dark up to 60 feet.

trait.name: Hulking Changeling (Annis Hag)
trait.text: The changeling gains a +1 racial bonus on melee damage.

trait.name: Pyrophile (Ash Hag)
trait.text: The changeling gains a +1 racial bonus on damage rolls when using spells with the fire descriptor. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 levels the changeling has beyond 1st.

trait.name: Green Widow (Green Hag)
trait.text: The changeling gains a +2 racial bonus on Bluff checks against creatures that are sexually attracted to her.

trait.name: Sea Lungs (Sea Hag)
trait.text: The changeling may hold her breath for a number of rounds equal to three times her Constitution before she risks drowning.

trait.name: Gaze Blindness (Mute Hag)
trait.text: The changeling gains a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against gaze attacks.

trait.name: Heartstone Heritor (Night Hag)
trait.text: The changeling gains a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against disease.

trait.name: Ice Climber (Winter Hag)
trait.text: The changeling gains a +5 racial bonus on Climb checks on icy or slippery surfaces.

trait.name: Inscrutable (Blood Hag)
trait.text: The Sense Motive check DC to gain a hunch about the changeling increases by 5.

trait.name: Wind Breaker (Storm Hag)
trait.text: The changeling is treated as two size categories larger for the purpose of resolving wind effects.

trait.name: Hag Magic (Alternate Racial Traits)
trait.text: Some changelings develop a gift for spellcasting instead of their mothers’ overtly fearsome traits. A changeling with this trait displays one or more stark white streaks in her hair as a child. The DCs of any saving throws against enchantment spells she casts increase by 1, and if her Charisma score is 11 or higher, she also gains the following spell-like abilities, usable once per day each: dancing lights, detect magic, disguise self, and pass without trace. The caster level of these spell-like abilities is equal to the changeling’s character level. The DC for these spell-like abilities is equal to 10 + the spell’s level + the changeling’s Charisma modifier. This racial trait replaces the claws and natural armor racial abilities.

trait.name: Hag Magic (Alternate Racial Traits)
trait.text: Some changelings have an innate talent for magic. They can choose one 1st- or 0-level spell from the witch spell list that does not have a material component costing more than 1 gp. They can use the chosen spell as a spell-like ability once per day if it is a 1st-level spell or three times per day if it is a 0-level spell (caster level equal to the changeling’s character level). This racial trait replaces natural armor.

trait.name: Object of Desire (Alternate Racial Traits)
trait.text: When the changeling has concealment or total concealment, the miss chance of attacks against her increases by 5%. This racial trait replaces hulking changeling.

trait.name: Ocean’s Daughter (Alternate Racial Traits)
trait.text: The changeling gains a +1 trait bonus on Swim checks. She automatically succeeds at Swim checks made to avoid nonlethal damage from swimming. This racial trait replaces sea lungs.

trait.name: Witchborn (Alternate Racial Traits)
trait.text: Most changelings are talented witches. They gain a +2 bonus to Intelligence and Charisma instead of a +2 bonus to Wisdom and Charisma. This racial trait alters the changeling’s racial ability score modifiers.
